SELECT DISTINCT C.CONTENTID, C.FACLTNM, C.LINEINTRO, C.INTRO, C.MANAGESTTUS, C.FEATURENM, C.INDUTY, C.LCTCL, C.DONM, C.SIGUNGUNM, C.ZIPCODE, C.ADDR1, C.ADDR2, C.MAPX, C.MAPY, C.DIRECTION,TEL, C.HOMEPAGE, C.RESVECL, C.GNRLSITECO, C.AUTOSITECO, C.GLAMPSITECO, C.CARAVSITECO, C.INDVDLCARAVSITECO, C.TOOLTIP, C.GLAMPINNERFCLTY, C.CARAVINNERFCLTY, C.OPERDECL, C.TOILETCO, C.SWRMCO, C.WTRPLCO, C.BRAZIERCL, C.SBRSCL, C.POSBLFCLTYCL, C.THEMAENVRNCL, C.EQPMNLENDCL, C.ANIMALCMGCL, C.FIRSTIMAGEURL, C.READCOUNT, C.REVIEWCOUNT, C.BOOKMARKCOUNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID) as bookmarkCount
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID AND LK.USER_NO = #{mNo}) as isBookmark
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID AND LK.USER_NO = 0) as isBookmark
FROM CAMPING_CONTENTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPING_CONTENTS_REPLY R ON R.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON R.USER_NO = M2.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOKMARK LK ON LK.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADDR1 LIKE '%${sido}%'
AND ADDR1 LIKE '%${gugun}%'
AND lctCl LIKE '%${lctCl}%'
AND FACLTNM LIKE '%${facltNm}%'
AND (
THEMAENVRNCL LIKE '%${themaEnvrnCl}%'
)
AND (
SBRSCL LIKE '%${sbrsCl}%'
)
AND ANIMALCMGCL LIKE '${checkedPet}%'
ORDER BY FIRSTIMAGEURL='' ASC, FACLTNM='' ASC LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONTENTID) FROM CAMPING_CONTENTS WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADDR1 LIKE '%${sido}%'
AND ADDR1 LIKE '%${gugun}%'
AND lctCl LIKE '%${lctCl}%'
AND FACLTNM LIKE '%${facltNm}%'
AND (
THEMAENVRNCL LIKE '%${themaEnvrnCl}%'
)
AND (
SBRSCL LIKE '%${sbrsCl}%'
)
AND ANIMALCMGCL LIKE '${checkedPet}%'

SELECT C.CONTENTID, C.FACLTNM, C.LINEINTRO, C.INTRO, C.MANAGESTTUS, C.FEATURENM, C.INDUTY, C.LCTCL, C.DONM, C.SIGUNGUNM, C.ZIPCODE, C.ADDR1, C.ADDR2, C.MAPX, C.MAPY, C.DIRECTION,TEL, C.HOMEPAGE, C.RESVECL, C.GNRLSITECO, C.AUTOSITECO, C.GLAMPSITECO, C.CARAVSITECO, C.INDVDLCARAVSITECO, C.TOOLTIP, C.GLAMPINNERFCLTY, C.CARAVINNERFCLTY, C.OPERDECL, C.TOILETCO, C.SWRMCO, C.WTRPLCO, C.BRAZIERCL, C.SBRSCL, C.POSBLFCLTYCL, C.THEMAENVRNCL, C.EQPMNLENDCL, C.ANIMALCMGCL, C.FIRSTIMAGEURL, C.READCOUNT, C.REVIEWCOUNT, C.BOOKMARKCOUNT, R.REPLY_NO AS R_REPLY_NO, R.CONTENTID AS R_CONTENTID, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, R.ORIGINAL_FILENAME AS R_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, R.RENAME_FILENAME AS R_RENAME_FILENAME, M.NICKNAME AS R_NICKNAME, R.CREATE_DATE AS R_CREATE_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID) as bookmarkCount
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID AND LK.USER_NO = #{mNo}) as isBookmark
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK LK WHERE C.CONTENTID = LK.CONTENTID AND LK.USER_NO = 0) as isBookmark
FROM CAMPING_CONTENTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPING_CONTENTS_REPLY R ON (C.CONTENTID = R.CONTENTID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOKMARK LK ON LK.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID WHERE C.CONTENTID = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPING_CONTENTS_REPLY( REPLY_NO, CONTENTID, USER_NO, CONTENT, STATUS, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME, CREATE_DATE) VALUES( 0, #{contentId}, #{mNo}, #{content}, DEFAULT, #{originalFileName}, #{renameFileName}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMPING_CONTENTS SET READCOUNT=#{readCount} WHERE CONTENTID=#{contentId}
UPDATE CAMPING_CONTENTS SET REVIEWCOUNT=#{reviewCount} WHERE CONTENTID=#{contentId}
UPDATE CAMPING_CONTENTS SET BOOKMARKCOUNT=#{bookmarkCount} WHERE CONTENTID=#{contentId}
mapper.insert: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO=#{mNo} AND CONTENTID=#{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CONTENTID, C.FACLTNM, C.ADDR1, C.FIRSTIMAGEURL FROM CAMPING_CONTENTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOKMARK LK ON LK.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID WHERE LK.USER_NO = 2;
